alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 17 at 7:51PM MDT until October 17 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Rapid City area, the Pennington County Plains, Haakon County and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 10 PM MDT this evening. For the Wind Advisory, until 3 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The high winds may blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.

area.areaDesc: Haakon; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains
